title: Who is K P Sharma Oli, set to take over as Nepal PM? - The Indian Express
description: Who is K P Sharma Oli, set to take over as Nepal PM?  The Indian Express
publisher.title: The Indian Express
full_article:
"I had the mandate, but the mandamus of the court went in Deuba’s favour," Nepal's then Prime Minister Khadga Prasad Sharma Oli had said in his farewell speech in July of 2021, after the Supreme Court's constitutional bench ruled that President Bidya Devi Bhandari's dissolution of the House of Representatives, recommended by Prime Minister Oli, was unlawful.

Now, in July of 2024, Nepali Congress (NC) chairman Sher Bahadur Deuba is in favour of Oli, chairman of the Communist Party of Nepal-Unified Marxist Leninist (CPN-UML), making him set to return as the Prime Minister of Nepal for a fourth stint. And, their first victory as allies comes as current PM Pushpa Kamal Dahal ‘Prachanda’ lost the vote of confidence in Parliament on Friday.

It was during a secret meeting in the beginning of the month, when Deuba, 78, and Oli, 72, head of the two biggest parties, had decided to form a coalition government, initially under the leadership of Oli, which will be headed by Deuba after 22 months.

Who is K P Sharma Oli?

Oli, a veteran Nepali communist politician, has had a tumultuous political career marked by his nationalist rhetoric and clashes with neighboring India. Oli has served as the Prime Minister of Nepal on two occasions, from 2015-2016 and 2018-2021, before being ousted by the Supreme Court in a controversial ruling.

Born in 1952 in eastern Nepal, Oli dropped out of school and was jailed at 22 for the murder of a farmer, Dharma Prasad Dhakal.

Oli's political career began quite early at the age of 12, when he moved to Jhapa with the help of Communist leader Ramnath Dahal. By this time, Oli was already influenced by the philosophies of Marx and Lenin, and by 1966, he had entered the realm of Communist politics. In 1970, Oli joined the Communist Party at 18 and was soon arrested, spending 14 years in prison. Though he seldom discusses his imprisonment, those close to him say it profoundly shaped him. Oli was released in the mid-1980s after receiving a royal pardon.

Also Read | Explained: The rise and fall of Nepal’s K P Oli

In 1971, Oli assumed leadership of the Jhapa rebellion, a cornerstone moment in the Nepali Communist movement. The Jhapa rebellion marked a significant shift in the Communist movement in Nepal, from its ideological stance to armed revolt. During this period, Oli spent several months behind bars in different parts of the country.

In the 1990s, Oli gained popularity for his efforts in the democratic movement that brought down the Panchayat regime. Over the next few years, he became a key figure in Nepali politics and an important leader in the Communist party. In 2015, he was elected Prime Minister after winning 338 out of 597 votes. However, in July 2016, Oli was forced to resign after the Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist-Centre) withdrew its support and he lost a no-confidence motion in Parliament.

As Prime Minister, Oli took a hardline stance against India, particularly during the 2015 Nepal blockade, which he blamed on Indian interference. He also strengthened ties with China and updated Nepal's map to include disputed territories with India, further straining relations with the southern neighbor.

Seen as the face of "Nepali nationalism”, Oli's nationalist rhetoric and confrontational approach towards critics and opponents earned him both praise and criticism. While his supporters saw him as a champion of Nepali sovereignty, his detractors accused him of undermining democratic institutions and failing to deliver on economic growth and development.

His popularity further grew when the Communist Party of Nepal-Unified Marxist Leninist (UML), in a pre-poll alliance with the Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist-Centre) under Pushpa Kamal Dahal Prachanda, achieved a two-thirds majority in the 2018 polls. This alliance led to the historic merger of the two parties into the Nepal Communist Party, with Oli and Prachanda co-chairing and agreeing to share the prime ministerial term. Oli's tenure saw ambitious promises like "Samriddha Nepal, Sukhi Nepali", but was marred by unmet expectations and centralisation of power, including bringing investigative agencies under the Prime Minister’s Office. His reluctance to honor the power-sharing agreement with Prachanda and preferential treatment of loyalists led to internal party conflicts, resulting in Prachanda’s withdrawal of support and the subsequent split of the alliance.

Also read | Why Nepal PM Oli blames India in tussle with old rival Prachanda

Oli's grip on power further weakened when he abruptly dissolved Parliament on December 20, 2020, citing obstruction in fulfilling his promises, despite constitutional restrictions against such a move. The Supreme Court nullified this dissolution, reinstating Parliament, but Oli continued to face criticism for avoiding parliamentary sessions and ruling by ordinance. Following a failed vote of confidence in May 2021, he was reappointed as Prime Minister under Article 76(3) as none of the opposition parties could form a majority government or stake their claim within the provided time frame, the President dissolved the House of Representatives at midnight on May 22, 2021 and albeit Oli as a minority prime minister. Consequently, the Oli government became an interim government until new elections were held from November 12 to 19, 2021..

This action was challenged, and the Supreme Court on 12 July 2021, not only set aside the dissolution but also annulled Oli's appointment, directing the appointment of Sher Bahadur Deuba as Prime Minister.

After the 2022 elections, which left the NC as the largest party, followed by the CPN-UML in second place, with the Maoist Centre party coming in third. Chairperson of CPN-Maoist Center Pushpa Kamal Dahal asserted his claim to the prime ministerial post. However, the NC, holding the majority in Parliament, refused to accept him as the new Prime Minister. Subsequently, Dahal sought support from the CPN-UML and the newly emerged Rastriya Swatantra Party (RSP) to bolster his candidacy and Dahal was appointed the Prime Minister, shifting Oli in the role of King maker.

However, in a shift of strategy in March 2023, Dahal agreed to support NC leader Ram Chandra Poudel for the presidency, leading to the formation of a coalition between the NC, Maoist party, and two smaller parties. This move pushed the Oli's CPN-UML into the opposition.

Nevertheless, after just one year, internal tensions and failed promises strained the NC-Maoist coalition, prompting the Maoists to revival of the coalition ties with the UML. Negotiations eventually resulted in Dahal and Oli reconciling to form a coalition, wary of diluting communist influence.

Now, in a new turn, this coalition ended too making Oli all set to step into Prachanda's shoes, marking a new chapter in Himalayan nation, where political stability has remained elusive and has had 13 different governments since 2008, when the centuries-old monarchy was abolished and Nepal turned into a Republic.
translated: नेपाल केरऽ तत्कालीन प्रधानमंत्री खदगा प्रसाद शर्मा ओली न॑ 2021 केरऽ जुलाई म॑ अपनऽ विदाई के भाषण म॑ कहलकै कि हमरा पास ई जनादेश छेलै, लेकिन कोर्ट केरऽ मंडम डुबा केरऽ पक्ष म॑ गेलऽ छेलै । प्रधानमंत्री ओली द्वारा अनुशंसित प्रतिनिधि सभा के गैरकानूनी छल।आब 2024 के जुलाई में नेपाली कांग्रेस (एनसी) के अध्यक्ष शेर बहादुर देउबा नेपाल-एकीकृत मार्क्सवादी लेनिनवादक (सीपीएन-यूएमएल) के कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी के अध्यक्ष ओली के पक्ष में छथि, जाहि सं हुनका नेपाल के प्रधानमंत्री के रूप में वापसी के लेल तैयार अछि एकटा चारिम टिंट लेल।आरू, सहयोगी दल के रूप म॑ हुनकऽ पहलऽ जीत तखनिये आबै छै जब॑ वर्तमान पीएम पुशपा कमल दहल ‘प्रचंडा’ न॑ शुक्रवार क॑ संसद म॑ विश्वास के मतदान स॑ हारलऽ छेलै ।ई महीना केरऽ शुरुआत म॑ एगो गुप्त बैठक के दौरान ही छेलै, जब॑ ७८ साल केरऽ डुबा आरू ७२ वर्षीय ओली न॑ दू बड़ऽ दल केरऽ प्रमुख, एगो गठबंधन सरकार बनाबै के फैसला करल॑ छेलै, जेकरा म॑ शुरुआत म॑ ओली के नेतृत्व म॑ छेलै, जेकरऽ नेतृत्व 2019 केरऽ नेतृत्व म॑ होतै । देउबा 22 महीना के बाद।केपी शर्मा ओली के छथि ?नेपाली साम्यवादी राजनीतिज्ञ ओली केरऽ एगो उथल-पुथल भरलऽ राजनीतिक कैरियर छै जेकरा म॑ अपनऽ राष्ट्रवादी बयानबाजी आरू पड़ोसी देश भारत स॑ टकराबै छै ।ओली दू बेर नेपाल के प्रधानमंत्री के रूप में काज केने छथि, 2015-2016 आ 2018-2021 तक, पहिने एकटा विवादित फैसला में सुप्रीम कोर्ट द्वारा सत्ता सं मुक्त भ गेल छल.1952 मे पूर्वी नेपाल मे जन्मल ओली स्कूल छोड़ि देलथि आ 22 बजे एकटा किसान धर्म प्रसाद ढाकल क हत्या क मामला मे जेल गेल छलाह।ओली के राजनीतिक कैरियर 12 साल के उम्र में काफी शुरूआत में शुरू भेल छल, जखन ओ साम्यवादी नेता रामनाथ दाहल के मदद सं झापा चलि गेलाह.एखन धरि ओली पहिने सँ मार्क्स आ लेनिन केर दर्शन सँ प्रभावित छलाह, आ 1966 धरि, ओ कम्युनिस्ट राजनीतिक क्षेत्र मे प्रवेश क' लेने छलाह.1970 में ओली 18 साल के उम्र में कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी में शामिल भ गेल आ जल्दिये गिरफ्तार क लेल गेल, जे 14 साल के जेल में बितेलक।भले ही ओ अपन जेल में बहुत चर्चा करैत छथि, मुदा हुनकर करीबी लोक कहैत छथि जे ई हुनका गहींर रूप सं आकार देलकनि.ओली क॑ 1980 केरऽ दशक के मध्य म॑ रॉयल क्षमा मिलला के बाद रिहा करलऽ गेलऽ छेलै ।भी पढ़ें |व्याख्या : नेपाल केरऽ केपी ओली केरऽ उदय आरू पतन १९७१ म॑ ओली न॑ झापा विद्रोह केरऽ नेतृत्व ग्रहण करलकै, जे नेपाली साम्यवादी आन्दोलन केरऽ एगो आधारशिला क्षण छेकै ।झापा विद्रोह नेपाल में साम्यवादी आन्दोलन में एक महत्वपूर्ण बदलाव के रूप में, ओकरऽ वैचारिक रुख स॑ ल॑ क॑ सशस्त्र विद्रोह तक के रूप में छेलै ।एहि अवधि मे ओली देश क विभिन्न हिस्सा मे कई मास क सलाख क पाछु रहलाह।1990 के दशक में ओली के पंचायत शासन के नीचा उतारय वाला लोकतांत्रिक आंदोलन में अपन प्रयास के लेल लोकप्रियता भेटलनि।अगिला किछु साल मे ओ नेपाली राजनीति मे एकटा प्रमुख हस्ती आ कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी मे एकटा महत्वपूर्ण नेता बनलाह ।2015 मे 597 मे स 338 वोट जीतलाक बाद प्रधानमंत्री चुनल गेलाह।लेकिन जुलाई २०१६ म॑ नेपाल केरऽ कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी (माओवादी-सेंटर) न॑ अपनऽ समर्थन वापस लेला के बाद ओएलआई क॑ इस्तीफा दै लेली मजबूर होय गेलै आरू संसद म॑ हुनकऽ कोनो आत्मविश्वास केरऽ प्रस्ताव हारलऽ छेलै ।प्रधानमंत्री के रूप मँ ओली नँ भारत के खिलाफ कट्टरपंथी रुख अपनौलकै, खास करी क 2015 के नेपाल नाकाबंदी के दौरान, जेकरा हुनी भारतीय हस्तक्षेप के जिम्मेदार ठहरौलकै ।चीन के साथ संबंध आरू अद्यतन नेपाल के नक्शा क भी मजबूत करलकै आरू भारत के साथ विवादित क्षेत्र क शामिल करलकै, जेकरा स॑ दक्षिणी पड़ोसी के साथ संबंध आरू तनाव छेलै ।"नेपाली राष्ट्रवाद” के चेहरा के रूप में देखल गेल ओली के राष्ट्रवादी बयानबाजी आ आलोचक आ विरोधी के प्रति टकराव के दृष्टिकोण हुनका प्रशंसा आ आलोचना दुनु के अर्जित केलनि।जखन कि हुनकर समर्थक हुनका नेपाली संप्रभुता के चैंपियन के रूप में देखलनि, हुनकर निंदक लोकनि हुनका पर लोकतांत्रिक संस्था के कमजोर करबाक आ असफलता के आरोप लगौलनि। आर्थिक विकास आ विकास पर वितरित करू। 2018 केरऽ पोल म॑ दू तिहाई बहुमत के कारण ई गठबंधन के कारण नेपाल कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी म॑ दूनू दलऽ के ऐतिहासिक विलय होय गेलै, जेकरा म॑ ओली आरू प्रचंडा के सह-अध्यक्ष छै आरू प्रधानमंत्री के कार्यकाल म॑ "सैम्रिद्ध जैसनऽ महत्वाकांक्षी वादा के साझा करलऽ गेलै । नेपाल, सुखी नेपाली", लेकिन अपूर्ण अपेक्षा आरू सत्ता के केंद्रीकरण स॑ बिगड़लऽ छेलै, जेकरा म॑ जांच एजेंसी क॑ प्रधानमंत्री कार्यालय के तहत लानलऽ जाय छै ।प्रचंडा के साथ सत्ता-साझेदारी समझौता के सम्मान करै के हुनकऽ अनिच्छा आरू वफादारऽ के साथ तरजीही व्यवहार के कारण आतंरिक दल के संघर्ष पैदा होय गेलै, जेकरऽ परिणामस्वरूप प्रचंडा के समर्थन वापस लेबै आरू ओकरऽ बाद के गठबंधन के विभाजन होय ​​गेलै ।भी पढ़ें |नेपाल पीएम ओली न॑ ई तरह के कदम के खिलाफ संवैधानिक प्रतिबंध के बावजूद, 20 दिसंबर, 2020 क॑ 20 दिसंबर, 2020 क॑ संवैधानिक प्रतिबंध के बावजूद अपनऽ वादा क॑ पूरा करै म॑ बाधा के हवाला दैत॑ हुअ॑ अचानक संसद क॑ भंग करी क॑ जब॑ हुनी सत्ता प॑ पुरानऽ प्रतिद्वंदी प्रचंडा ओली के पकड़ के साथ भारत क॑ कियैक दोषी ठहराबै छै ।सुप्रीम कोर्ट न॑ ई विघटन क॑ श्रेष्ठ करी क॑ संसद क॑ भड़काबै के काम करलकै, लेकिन ओएलआई क॑ संसदीय सत्रऽ स॑ बचै आरू अध्यादेश स॑ फैसला लेली आलोचना के सामना करना जारी रखलकै ।मई 2021 मे विफल मतदान के बाद हुनका अनुच्छेद 76(3) के तहत प्रधानमंत्री के रूप में पुनः नियुक्त कयल गेल छल कियाक त कोनो विपक्षी दल बहुमत सरकार के गठन नै क सकैत छल या प्रदत्त समय सीमा के भीतर अपन दावा दांव पर नै राखि सकैत छल, राष्ट्रपति के प्रतिनिधि सभा के भंग क देल गेल 22 मई, 2021 कए आधा राति मे आ अल्पसंख्यक प्रधानमंत्री क रूप मे ओली यद्यपि।फलस्वरूप, ओली सरकार एक अंतरिम सरकार बनि गेल जाबत 12 सं 19 नवंबर, 2021 धरि नव चुनाव नहिं भेल.. एहि कार्रवाई कें चुनौती देल गेल, आ 12 जुलाई 2021 कें सुप्रीम कोर्ट, न केवल विघटन कें अलग क देल गेल, ओली कें नियुक्ति कें सेहो नियुक्ति केलक, निर्देशित, शेर बहादुर देउबा के प्रधानमंत्री के रूप में नियुक्ति।2022 के चुनाव के बाद, जेकरा स॑ एनसी क॑ सबस॑ बड़ऽ पार्टी के रूप म॑ छोड़ी देलऽ गेलऽ छेलै, जेकरा बाद सीपीएन-यूएमएल दूसरऽ स्थान प॑ छेलै, जेकरा म॑ माओवादी सेंटर पार्टी तेसरऽ स्थान प॑ रहलऽ छेलै ।सीपीएन-माओवादी केंद्र पुष्पा कमल दहल के अध्यक्ष प्रधानमंत्री पद पर अपन दावा के पुष्टि केलनि।मुदा संसद मे बहुमत पकड़ने एनसी हुनका नव प्रधानमंत्री के रूप मे स्वीकार करय सं मना करि देलखिन्ह.एकरऽ बाद दहल न॑ सीपीएन-यूएमएल आरू नव उभरलऽ रस्तिया स्वातान्त्र पार्टी (आरएसपी) स॑ हुनकऽ उम्मीदवारी क॑ बल दै लेली समर्थन मँगलकै आरू दहल क॑ प्रधानमंत्री नियुक्त करलऽ गेलै, जेकरा स॑ ओली क॑ राजा निर्माता के भूमिका म॑ बदली देलऽ गेलै ।लेकिन मार्च २०२३ म॑ रणनीति केरऽ बदलाव म॑ दहल न॑ राष्ट्रपति पद लेली एनसी के नेता राम चंद्र पौडेल क॑ समर्थन दै लेली सहमत होय गेलै, जेकरा स॑ एनसी, माओवादी पार्टी आरू दू छोटऽ दल के बीच गठबंधन के गठन होय ​​गेलै ।ई कदम ओएलआई के सीपीएन-यूएमएल के विरोध में धकेल देलक.एकरऽ बावजूद, महज एक साल के बाद आंतरिक तनाव आरू असफल वादा करलकै, एनसी-माओवादी गठबंधन क॑ तनाव देलकै, जेकरा स॑ माओवादी सिनी क॑ गठबंधन संबंधऽ के पुनर्जागरण यूएमएल के साथ करलऽ गेलै ।वार्ता के परिणामस्वरूप अंततः दाहल आरू ओली साम्यवादी प्रभाव के पतला करै स॑ सावधान होय ​​क॑ गठबंधन के रूप म॑ सामंजस्य बनैलऽ गेलै ।आब, एकटा नव मोड़ पर, ई गठबंधन बहुत समाप्त भ गेल जाहि सं ओली सब प्रचंडा के जूता में कदम रखबाक लेल सेट भ गेल, हिमालयन राष्ट्र में एकटा नव अध्याय के चिन्हित केलक, जतय राजनीतिक स्थिरता दुर्लभ रहल अछि आ 2008 सं 13 अलग-अलग सरकार अछि, जखन सदियो सं पुरान राजतंत्र समाप्त भ गेल आ नेपाल गणतंत्र मे बदलि गेल।
label: Opinion

title: Monsoon disasters claim 101 lives in Nepal so far - Myrepublica
description: Monsoon disasters claim 101 lives in Nepal so far  Myrepublica
publisher.title: Myrepublica
full_article:
KATHMANDU, July 12: Monsoon-induced disasters have claimed the lives of 101 people across Nepal as of now, with 108 others injured and six still missing.

According to Nepal Police Spokesperson Dan Bahadur Karki, from June 28, 9 AM, to July 12, 8 AM, the fatalities include one in Kathmandu, 19 in Koshi Province, six in Bagmati Province, 36 in Gandaki Province, 23 in Lumbini Province, four in Karnali, and seven in Sudurpaschim Province.

Among the victims, 27 died in floods, 50 in landslides, and 23 due to lightning strikes.

Currently, two individuals are missing in Koshi, two in Bagmati, and one each in Gandaki and Sudurpaschim.

The police have reported approximately Rs 4.1 million in physical damage caused by these disasters.

To aid in the ongoing search and rescue efforts, 501 police personnel have been deployed.
translated: काठमांडू, 12 जुलाई : मानसून-प्रेरित आपदा न॑ अभी तलक पूरा नेपाल भर म॑ १०१ लोगऽ के जान ल॑ लेल॑ छै, जेकरा म॑ १०८ लोगऽ क॑ घायल आरू छह लोग अभी भी गायब छै ।नेपाल पुलिस के प्रवक्ता दान बहादुर कार्की के अनुसार, 28 जून, 9 बजे स॑ 12 जुलाई, 8 बजे तक, ई जानलेवा घटना म॑ कोशी प्रांत म॑ 19, बागमती प्रांत म॑ छह, 36, गंडाकी प्रांत म॑ 36, लम्बिनी प्रांत म॑ 23, 23 म॑ 19 लोगऽ म॑ शामिल छै । कर्नाली में चारि, आ सूदुरपचिम प्रांत में सात.पीड़ित मे 27 गोटे बाढ़ि मे, 50 भूस्खलन मे, आ बिजलीक प्रहारक कारण 23 गोटेक मृत्यु भ गेलनि।वर्तमान में कोशी में दू व्यक्ति, बागमती में दू व्यक्ति, आ एक-एक गोटे गंडाकी आ सूदुरपचिम में गायब छथि.पुलिस एहि आपदा सब सं भेल लगभग 41 लाख रुपया के शारीरिक नुकसान के रिपोर्ट देलक अछि.सतत खोज आ बचाव प्रयास मे सहायता करबाक लेल 501 पुलिसकर्मी कए तैनात कैल गेल अछि।
label: Opinion

title: PM Prachanda gives nod to Nepal-China rail deal day before no-confidence vote - Firstpost
description: PM Prachanda gives nod to Nepal-China rail deal day before no-confidence vote  Firstpost
publisher.title: Firstpost
full_article:
Nepal Prime Minister Pushpa Kamal Dahal ‘Prachanda’ approved a deal to link Nepal with China by rail under Beijing’s ambitious Belt and Road Initiative, a day before he lost a vote of confidence.

The decision carries more operational than political significance and aligns with Nepal’s participation in Chinese President Xi Jinping’s multi-billion-dollar pet infrastructure project, the MyRepublica news portal said quoting government sources.

“The Cabinet meeting held on Thursday decided to approve the ‘Strengthening the Development Cooperation in Building the Trans-Himalayan Multidimensional Connectivity Network’ agreement between Nepal and China,” the report quoted Communication Minister and the government’s spokesperson Rekha Sharma as saying.

Advertisement

However, a minister downplayed its immediate impact, stating, “This is an initial decision; details of project implementation and BRI modalities are yet to be finalised.”’

President Ram Chandra Paudel on Friday started consultation with constitutional and legal experts following Prime Minister Pushpa Kamal Dahal ‘Prachanda’ failure to secure a trust vote in Parliament and asked him to hold the fort as a caretaker till a new government is in place.

The development is expected to pave the way to forming a new coalition government led by former prime minister K P Sharma Oli, 72. Prachanda lost the vote of confidence in the House of Representatives (HoR) earlier in the evening as he received only 63 votes in the 275-member House of Representatives (HoR) with 194 votes against the motion. At least 138 votes are needed to win the vote of trust.

window._taboola=window._taboola||[],_taboola.push({mode:"thumbnails-mid-article",container:"taboola-mid-article-thumbnails",placement:"Mid Article Thumbnails",target_type:"mix"})

A total of 258 HoR members participated in the voting while one member chose no vote.

Prachanda, 69, chairman of the Communist Party of Nepal-Maoist Centre (CPN-MC), faced the trust vote as Oli-led Communist Party of Nepal-Unified Marxist Leninist (CPN-UML) withdrew support from his government last week after inking a power-sharing deal with the largest party in the House – the Nepali Congress (NC) – led by Sher Bahadur Deuba.

The BRI has raised global concerns over China’s debt diplomacy of extending huge loans to smaller countries for unsustainable infrastructure projects. The Hambantota port, which was funded by a Chinese loan, was leased to Beijing in a 99-year debt-for-equity swap in 2017 after Sri Lanka failed to pay off the debt.

Advertisement

India has protested to China over BRI’s $60 billion China-Pakistan Economic Corridor flagship project as it is being laid through the Pakistan-occupied Kashmir (PoK).

के वोट खोय गेलै ।ई फैसला राजनीतिक महत्व स॑ अधिक परिचालन म॑ छै आरू चीनी राष्ट्रपति शी जिनपिंग केरऽ बहु-अरब डॉलर के पालतू बुनियादी ढाँचा परियोजना म॑ नेपाल केरऽ भागीदारी के साथ संरेखित छै, मायरेपुब्लिका थिक;परियोजना कार्यान्वयन आरू बीआरआई मोडालिटी केरऽ विवरण क॑ अंतिम रूप देलऽ गेलऽ छै ।’’ राष्ट्रपति राम चंद्र पौडेल न॑ शुक्रवार क॑ प्रधानमंत्री पुष्पा कमल दाहल ‘प्रचंडा’ के संसद म॑ ट्रस्ट मत प्राप्त करै title: KP Sharma Oli stakes claim to form new Nepal govt after Prachanda loses trust vote - The Indian Express
description: KP Sharma Oli stakes claim to form new Nepal govt after Prachanda loses trust vote  The Indian Express
publisher.title: The Indian Express
full_article:
Former Nepal PM KP Sharma Oli on Friday staked claim to lead the new government after incumbent Pushpa Kamal Dahal ‘Prachanda’ lost the trust vote in Parliament.

Earlier in the evening, President Ram Chandra Paudel urged political parties to stake a claim to form a new government, setting a Sunday evening deadline to prove a majority. This call came hours after Prachanda failed to secure a trust vote in Parliament.

“President Paudel called on members of the House of Representatives (HoR) to stake a claim for the post of prime minister, demonstrating a majority with the support of two or more political parties in the lower house,” an official statement said.

The President has requested House members to present a majority through the support of represented parties by 5 pm on Sunday, the statement added.

Following Prachanda's loss in the trust vote, the President asked him to remain as a caretaker PM until a new government is formed.

Prachanda lost the vote of confidence in the House of Representatives (HoR), receiving only 63 votes out of the 275-member House, with 194 votes against the motion. A minimum of 138 votes is required to win the trust vote.

A total of 258 HoR members participated in the voting, with one member abstaining.

Prachanda, 69, chairman of the Communist Party of Nepal-Maoist Centre (CPN-MC), faced the trust vote after the Oli-led Communist Party of Nepal-Unified Marxist Leninist (CPN-UML) withdrew support from his government last week. This withdrawal followed a power-sharing deal with the largest party in the House, the Nepali Congress (NC), led by Sher Bahadur Deuba.
translated: नेपाल केरऽ पूर्व पीएम केपी शर्मा ओली न॑ शुक्रवार क॑ नियुक्ति के बाद नयका सरकार के नेतृत्व करै के दावा दांव प॑ रखलकै, जेकरा बाद संसद म॑ ट्रस्ट मतदान होय ​​गेलै ।एहि सं पहिने साँझ मे राष्ट्रपति राम चंद्र पौदेल राजनीतिक दल सं आग्रह केलनि जे एकटा नव सरकार बनबाक दावा दांव पर लगाबथि, जाहि सं रवि दिनक साँझक समय सीमा निर्धारित भय बहुमत साबित भ सकय.ई आह्वान प्रचंडा संसद मे ट्रस्ट मत प्राप्त करय मे विफल रहला के किछु घंटा बाद भेल छल.एक आधिकारिक बयान मँ कहलौ गेलौ छै, “राष्ट्रपति पौडेल नँ प्रधानमंत्री पद के लेल दावा दांव लगाबै लेली प्रतिनिधि सभा (होर) के सदस्यौ स॑ आह्वान करलकै, जेकरा म॑ निचला सदन म॑ दू या एकरा स॑ अधिक राजनीतिक दलऽ के समर्थन स॑ बहुमत के प्रदर्शन करलऽ गेलै ।बयान मँ आरू कहलौ गेलौ छै कि राष्ट्रपति नँ रविवार क 5 बजे तलक प्रतिनिधित्व करै वाला पक्ष के समर्थन के माध्यम स॑ सदन के सदस्यऽ स॑ बहुमत पेश करै के आग्रह करल॑ छै ।ट्रस्ट वोट म॑ प्रचंडा केरऽ नुकसान के बाद राष्ट्रपति न॑ हुनका स॑ कहलकै कि जब॑ तलक नया सरकार केरऽ गठन नै होय जाय छै, तब॑ तलक केयरटेकर पीएम के रूप म॑ बनलऽ रहै ।प्रचंडा क॑ प्रतिनिधि सभा म॑ विश्वास मत (होर) म॑ 275 सदस्यीय सदन म॑ स॑ मात्र 63 वोट मिललै, जेकरा म॑ ई प्रस्ताव के खिलाफ 194 वोट मिललै ।ट्रस्ट वोट जीतय लेल न्यूनतम 138 वोट के जरूरत अछि.मतदान मे कुल 258 हॉर सदस्य भाग लेलथि, जाहि मे एकटा सदस्य परहेज केलथि।नेपाल केरऽ एकीकृत मार्क्सवादी लेनिनिस्ट (सीपीएन-यूएमएल) केरऽ ओली के नेतृत्व वाला कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी न॑ पिछला सप्ताह अपनऽ सरकार स॑ समर्थन वापस ल॑ क॑ नेपाल-माओस्ट सेंटर (सीपीएन-एमसी) केरऽ कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी केरऽ अध्यक्ष प्रचंडा क॑ ट्रस्ट वोट के सामना करना पड़लै ।ई वापसी सदन केरऽ सबस॑ बड़ऽ पार्टी, नेपाली कांग्रेस (एनसी) के साथ सत्ता-साझेदारी के सौदा के बाद शेर बहादुर देउबा के नेतृत्व म॑ ।
label: Opinion

title: 14th govt in 16 years: Oli set to become Nepal's PM as Prachanda loses trust vote - Firstpost
description: 14th govt in 16 years: Oli set to become Nepal's PM as Prachanda loses trust vote  Firstpost
publisher.title: Firstpost
full_article:
K P Sharma Oli is set to become Nepal’s prime minister once again after incumbent Prime Minister Pushpa Kamal Dahal ’Prachanda’ on Friday failed to win a trust vote in Parliament after surviving four times in the past, amidst frequent political turmoil in the Himalayan nation.

Communist Party of Nepal-Unified Marxist Leninist (CPN-UML) Chairman Oli on Friday staked his claim to lead a new majority government by presenting his claim before President Ramchandra Paudel with the support of 165 lawmakers, including 77 from his party and 88 from the Nepali Congress.

Advertisement

Although fringe parties, including the Janata Samajbadi Party (JSP), JSP-Nepal, Loktantrik Samajbadi Party, Janamat Party and Nagarik Unmukti Party are in favour of the Congress-UML coalition government, Oli staked a claim showing the support of only UML and Congress to the President.

“We have staked a claim for the new government before the President. Now, it’s up to him to decide when to make the appointment,” said Ramesh Lekhak, Congress chief whip.

Prime Minister Prachanda, also the chairman of the Communist Party of Nepal-Maoist Centre (CPN-MC), faced the trust vote as Oli-led CPN-UML withdrew support from his government last week after inking a power-sharing deal with the largest party in the House – the Nepali Congress (NC) – led by Sher Bahadur Deuba.

window._taboola=window._taboola||[],_taboola.push({mode:"thumbnails-mid-article",container:"taboola-mid-article-thumbnails",placement:"Mid Article Thumbnails",target_type:"mix"})

Prachanda, 69, lost his position on Friday, over 18 months after his appointment, as he failed to secure a vote of confidence during a floor test in the House of Representatives.

He failed to secure the 138 votes required to endorse the trust motion as only 63 lawmakers voted in his favour in the 275-strong House of Representatives. A total of 194 lawmakers voted against him, over 18 months after becoming prime minister on December 25, 2022.

Friday’s trust vote was the fifth time Prachanda tested himself on the floor after he was appointed prime minister some 18 months ago. During the first confidence vote on January 10, 2023, he received strong support with 268 votes.

Advertisement

In the second floor test on March 20, 2023, after the UML-Maoist alliance broke, he secured 172 votes in Parliament. In the third vote of confidence held on March 13, 2024, after forming a new alliance with the UML, Prachanda received 157 votes.

On May 21, 2024, following the JSP split, he secured 157 votes with no opposition votes registered.

With Prachanda the trust vote on his fifth attempt, CPN-UML Chairman Oli is now expected to become the prime minister for a fourth time with the support of the Nepali Congress.

Oli is known for his pro-Beijing stance and it would be interesting to see how he maintains ties of equi-proximity with both India and China.

Advertisement

Ties between India and Nepal came under severe strain in 2020 after Kathmandu published a new political map that showed the three Indian territories – Limpiyadhura, Kalapani and Lipulekh – as part of Nepal. Oli who was prime minister then had attempted to use the issue to fend off increasing domestic pressure and challenge his leadership.

Nepal’s President had earlier called on political parties to stake claim to form the new government with a Sunday evening deadline to prove the majority.

“President Paudel called on members of the House of Representatives (HoR) to stake a claim for the post of prime minister showing a majority with the support of two or more political parties in the lower house,” a statement from the Office of Paudel said.

Advertisement

The President has called on the House members to present the majority through the support of parties represented in the lower house by 5 pm on Sunday, it added.

The NC has 89 seats in the HoR, while CPN-UML has 78. Their combined strength of 167 is much more than the 138 required for a majority in the lower house.

Deuba has already endorsed Oli as the next prime minister as per the 7-point deal both parties agreed upon on Monday before toppling Prachanda-led government.

According to the agreement, Oli and Deuba will share the premiership during the remaining period of the House of Representatives; in the first phase Oli will become the Prime Minister for one and a half years and then, Deuba will take the post for the rest of the period.

Advertisement

Nepal has had 13 governments in the last 16 years, indicating the fragile nature of the Himalayan nation’s political system.

Earlier, Prachanda sharply criticised the alliance formed between the NC and the UML and accused the two largest parties of forming their coalition out of fear rather than shared principles.

”If the NC and the UML were united by common beliefs or goals, I would not be concerned. Instead, they are bound by a fear of good governance,” he said.

While questioning if the public had approved this alliance, he voiced concerns about potential regression and autocracy, asserting that the NC and the UML had joined forces as good governance began to take root in the country.

He argued that, in a healthy democracy, the main opposition party should not form the government, accusing the NC and the UML of pushing the nation toward regression.

NC Chief Whip Ramesh Lekhak responded to Dahal’s accusations by defending the party’s commitment to safeguarding the constitution and democracy.

”It is a party that has made history by aligning the most prominent anti-democrats in the history of democracy. We should refrain from making comments based on imagination and assumptions,” he said.

Deputy Prime Minister and Home Minister Rabi Lamichhane, who is also the chairman of Rastriya Swatantra Party, questioned the legitimacy of the overnight agreement between the NC and the UML.

”We will only know who is being protected in the name of safeguarding the Constitution once the agreement is made public. However, my party and I cannot accept that it is an agreement to safeguard the Constitution.
translated: हिमालय केरऽ राष्ट्र म॑ बार-बार राजनीतिक उथल-पुथल के बीच अतीत म॑ चारि बार बचला के बाद वर्तमान प्रधानमंत्री पुष्पा कमल दाहल ‘प्रचंडा’ के बीच बार-बार राजनीतिक उथल-पुथल के बीच केपी शर्मा ओली के प्रस्तुति करै के आह्वान करल॑ छै ।एनसी केरऽ एचओआर म॑ ८९ सीट छै, जबकि सीपीएन-यूएमएल केरऽ ७८ छै ।हुनकरऽ संयुक्त ताकत १६७ केरऽ निचला घर म॑ बहुमत लेली आवश्यक १३८ स॑ बहुत अधिक छै ।प्रचंडा के नेतृत्व वाला अनुसार, ओली आरू डूबा प्रतिनिधि सभा के शेष अवधि के दौरान प्रीमियरशिप के साझा करतै;पहिल चरण मे ओली डेढ़ साल धरि प्रधानमंत्री बनताह आ फेर, देउबा बाकी अवधि लेल पद लेताह।विज्ञापन नेपाल केरऽ पिछला १६ सालऽ सुशासन के डर स बान्हल रहैत छथि।'जनता न॑ ई गठबंधन क॑ मंजूरी द॑ देल॑ छै कि नै, ई सवाल उठाबैत॑ हुअ॑ संभावित प्रतिगमन आरू निरंकुशता के बारे म॑ चिंता के आवाज उठैलकै, ई बात के पुष्टि करतें हुअ॑ कि एनसी आरू यूएमएल के साथ मिल क॑ देश म॑ सुशासन जड़ जमाबै के शुरू होय गेलऽ छै ।हुनकऽ तर्क छेलै कि, स्वस्थ लोकतंत्र म॑ मुख्य विपक्षी दल क॑ सरकार नै बनैलऽ जाय, जेकरा प॑ एनसी आरू यूएमएल प॑ राष्ट्र क॑ प्रतिगमन के तरफ धकेल॑ के आरोप लगैलऽ जाय ।एनसी केरऽ प्रमुख व्हिप रमेश लेखाक न॑ संविधान आरू लोकतंत्र के सुरक्षा लेली पार्टी केरऽ प्रतिबद्धता के रक्षा करी क॑ दहल केरऽ आरोपऽ के जवाब देलकै ।”ई एगो पक्ष छै जे लोकतंत्र के इतिहास के सबसें प्रमुख डेमोक्रेट के संरेखित करी क॑ इतिहास रचने छै ।कल्पना आ धारणा क आधार पर टिप्पणी करबा स हमरा सब कए परहेज करबाक चाही।'उपप्रधानमंत्री आरू गृहमंत्री रबी लामिशिने, जे रसिया स्वातानत्र पार्टी के अध्यक्ष भी छै, न॑ एनसी आरू यूएमएल के बीच रात भर के समझौता के वैधता प॑ सवाल उठैलकै ।”हमरा सब के तखने पता चलत जे एक बेर समझौता के सार्वजनिक भेला पर संविधान के सुरक्षा के नाम पर केकरा संरक्षित कयल जा रहल अछि |मुदा, हमर पक्ष आ हम ई स्वीकार नहि क' सकैत छी जे ई संविधानक रक्षाक समझौता अछि.

full_article: Nepal Prime Minister Pushpa Kamal Dahal 'Prachanda' will be stepping down from the position after less than 20 months in power, after he lost the fifth vote of confidence in Parliament on Friday. Watch in for more details!

title: Rescue efforts suspended after Nepal landslide - Yahoo! Voices
description: Rescue efforts suspended after Nepal landslide  Yahoo! Voices
publisher.title: Yahoo! Voices
full_article:
STORY: Jugasar Raya Yadav was a passenger on a bus in Nepal's Chitwan district on Friday (July 12) when a landslide hit, sending his and another vehicle into the swollen, fast-flowing river below.

"All of a sudden, mud and debris started to come down. We jumped from the bus as it started veering off. I was at the front of the bus with five others but only three of us were able to survive. There were about 35 people on the bus."

A search of the Trishuli River, some 53 miles west of Kathmandu, was suspended on Friday (July 12), after efforts by hundreds of rescuers and more than two dozen divers yielded no signs of the buses or their missing passengers.

A local official said the search would resume on Saturday.

Footage released by the Nepalese Armed Police Force showed rescue boats on the water, which appeared brown in colour because of mud and silt.

Authorities said that some passengers survived with only minor injures, having jumped from the buses before the mass of rocks and mud came down the slopes.

Landslides and floods triggered by torrential monsoon rains have killed at least 91 people in Nepal since mid-June.

More than a dozen people died across the country in lightning strikes, floods and landslides triggered by the rain over the 24 hours preceding the Chitwan disaster, police said on Friday evening.

Following the incident involving the two buses, the government announced plans to ban night bus operations in places with poor weather forecasting facilities.
translated: कहानी : जुगासर रायाव शुक्रवार (12 जुलाई) क॑ नेपाल केरऽ चिटवन जिला म॑ बस म॑ एगो यात्री छेलै जब॑ एगो भूस्खलन के टक्कर होय गेलै, जेकरा स॑ ओकरऽ आरू एगो आरू गाड़ी नीचें सूजन, तेज बहय वाला नदी म॑ भेजलऽ गेलै ।"असीना, कीचड़ आ मलबा उतरय लागल। हम सब बस सँ कूदि गेलहुँ जेना-जेना ई हड़बड़ शुरू भेल। हम पाँच गोटेक संग बसक आगू मे छलहुँ मुदा हम सभ मात्र तीन गोटे जीवित रहि सकलौं। लगभग 35 टा छल। बस मे लोक।"काठमांडू सं करीब 53 मील पश्चिम ट्रिशुली नदीक खोज शुक्रदिन (12 जुलाई) निलंबित क देल गेल, सैकड़ों बचावकर्ता आ दू दर्जन सं बेसी गोताखोर लोकनिक प्रयास सं बसक कोनो संकेत नहिं भेटल आ ने ओकर लापता यात्री.एकटा स्थानीय अधिकारी कहलनि जे शनिदिन एहि खोज शुरू होयत।नेपाली सशस्त्र पुलिस बल द्वारा जारी फुटेज में पानि पर बचाव नाव देखायल गेल, जे कीचड़ आ गाद के कारण रंग में भूरा रंग में देखा रहल छल.अधिकारियऽ न॑ कहलकै कि कुछ यात्री खाली छोटऽ-छोटऽ चोट के साथ बची गेलै, जेकरा म॑ चट्टान आरू कीचड़ के मास स॑ पहल॑ बसऽ स॑ कूदी क॑ ढलान प॑ उतरी गेलऽ छेलै ।मूसलाधार मानसून बरसात स शुरू भेल भूस्खलन आ बाढ़ि जून क मध्य स नेपाल मे कम स कम 91 लोक क मौत भ गेल अछि।पुलिस न॑ शुक्रवार के साँझ म॑ कहलकै कि चिटवान केरऽ आपदा स॑ पहल॑ बरसात स॑ बरसात स॑ शुरू होय वाला बिजली केरऽ प्रहार, बाढ़ आरू भूस्खलन म॑ देश भर म॑ एक दर्जन स॑ अधिक लोगऽ के मौत होय गेलै ।दूनू बस स॑ जुड़लऽ घटना के बाद सरकार न॑ मौसम केरऽ खराब पूर्वानुमान सुविधा वाला जगहऽ प॑ रात बस परिचालन प॑ रोक लगाबै के योजना के घोषणा करलकै ।
label: Interview

title: Nepal PM Prachanda loses confidence vote, Oli set to take charge - The Indian Express
description: Nepal PM Prachanda loses confidence vote, Oli set to take charge  The Indian Express
publisher.title: The Indian Express
full_article:
Prime Minister Pushpa Kamal Dahal Prachanda suffered a major defeat as the vote of confidence he moved in Parliament secured only 63 votes against 194, resulting in his exit from power. The outcome in the House of Representatives came after a three-hour-long fiery debate with a visibly downcast Prachanda accusing outsiders of bringing political forces against him.

He submitted his resignation to President Ram Chandra Poudel soon after.

Prachanda had to seek the mandatory vote of confidence — the fifth since last December — as his ally for the past four months, Communist Party of Nepal-Unified Marxist Leninist (UML), withdrew support and allied with the Nepali Congress (NC).

As per the agreement, UML chairman K P Oli will be the next Prime Minister with NC as the coalition partner. The agreement inked on July 2 at midnight also envisages NC chief Sher Bahadur Deuba succeeding Oli after about 22 months for the latter half of the current tenure of Parliament.

Meanwhile, President Ram Chandra Poudel Friday invited political parties to explore the formation of a new government under Article 76( 2) by 5 pm on Sunday. However, Oli furnished proof of majority late Friday as he, along with Deuba, met the President. The new government will have to seek a mandatory vote of confidence within 30 days.

Prachanda’s fall comes a month after he publicly boasted that there will be “upheavals” as long as he is in power and getting rid of him would not be easy as numerically he is positioned advantageously. With just 32 members in a hung Parliament that has 275 members, he had been able to acquire the support of two big parties — UML and NC — at times one replacing the other as allies.

In his 90-minute speech in the House, Prachanda said he was worried not over the loss of the government, but over the possibility of the return of regressive and dictatorial forces.

He also warned that the talk about the review of the Constitution — a joint agenda of the NC and the UML — had all the potential to encourage such forces.

Yogesh Bhattarai, a prominent UML parliamentarian said the amendment would take place within the ambit of the progressive vision of the current Constitution. Nepali Congress leader Ramesh Lekhak, who is expected to become the Home Minister in the new coalition, said the Constitution is not something that should be left untouched.

Prachanda warned the would-be governing parties not to dismantle any progressive achievements like the empowerment of Dalits, women, and ethnic groups made after the revolution and urged the parties to consider giving 50 per cent reservation for women in public offices.
translated: प्रधानमंत्री पुष्पा कमाल दहल प्रचंडा क॑ संसद म॑ जे विश्वास के मतदान स॑ हुनी 194 के खिलाफ मात्र 63 मत हासिल करलकै, ओकरऽ परिणामस्वरूप सत्ता स॑ बाहर निकलै के बाद हुनकऽ आश्वस्तता के मतदान होय ​​गेलै ।प्रतिनिधि सभा में परिणाम तीन घंटा के आगि के बहस के बाद भेल छल जाहि में एकटा दृश्यमान रूप सं उनसार प्रचंडा के खिलाफ राजनीतिक शक्ति के हुनका खिलाफ लानय के आरोप लगाओल गेल छल.ओ अपन इस्तीफा राष्ट्रपति राम चन्द्र पौदेल के तुरंत बाद सौंपलनि।प्रचंडा क॑ अनिवार्य वोट के मांग करना छेलै — पिछला दिसंबर के बाद स॑ पाँचमऽ — पिछला चार महीना स॑ हुनकऽ सहयोगी के रूप म॑, नेपाल-एकीकृत मार्क्सवादी लेनिनवादक (यूएमएल) केरऽ कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी न॑ समर्थन वापस ल॑ क॑ नेपाली कांग्रेस (एनसी) के साथ गठबंधन करलकै ।समझौता के अनुसार यूएमएल के अध्यक्ष केपी ओएलआई गठबंधन के भागीदार के रूप मे एनसी के संग अगिला प्रधानमंत्री होयत.2 जुलाई क॑ आधा रात म॑ शामिल ई समझौता म॑ एनसी केरऽ प्रमुख शेर बहादुर देउबा न॑ भी संसद केरऽ वर्तमान कार्यकाल के उत्तरार्ध लेली लगभग 22 महीना के बाद ओली के बाद ओली के बाद के परिकल्पना करलकै ।एम्हर राष्ट्रपति राम चंद्र पौदेल शुक्रदिन रविदिन 5 बजे तक अनुच्छेद 76( 2) के तहत एकटा नव सरकार के गठन के खोज करय लेल राजनीतिक दल के आमंत्रित केलनि।लेकिन ओली शुक्रदिन देर राति मे बहुमत के प्रमाण सुसज्जित केलनि कारण ओ राष्ट्रपति सं भेंट केलनि.नव सरकार के 30 दिन के भीतर अनिवार्य मतदान के मांग करय पड़त.प्रचंडा केरऽ गिरावट सार्वजनिक रूप स॑ ई बात के एक महीना बाद आबै छै कि जब॑ तलक ओकरा सत्ता म॑ रहतै आरू ओकरा स॑ छुटकारा पाबै, “उद्योग” होतै, कैन्हेंकि संख्यात्मक रूप स॑ वू फायदेमंद रूप स॑ स्थिति म॑ छै ।हंग संसद म॑ महज ३२ सदस्यऽ के साथ जेकरऽ २७५ सदस्य छै, वू दू बड़ऽ दल — यूएमएल आरू एनसी — के समर्थन प्राप्त करै म॑ सफल रहलै, जेकरा म॑ एक बार एक के जगह प॑ एक दोसरा के सहयोगी के रूप म॑ बदली देलऽ गेलऽ छेलै ।सदन म॑ अपनऽ ९० मिनट के भाषण म॑ प्रचंडा न॑ कहलकै कि सरकार केरऽ नुकसान के कारण ओकरा चिंता छै, बल्कि प्रतिगामी आरू तानाशाही शक्ति केरऽ वापसी के संभावना के बारे म॑ चिंतित छै ।हुनी ई भी चेतावनी देलकै कि संविधान के समीक्षा के बारे म॑ बात — एनसी आरू यूएमएल केरऽ संयुक्त एजेंडा — म॑ ऐसनऽ ताकतऽ क॑ प्रोत्साहित करै के सब संभावना छै ।यूएमएल केरऽ एगो प्रमुख संसद सदस्य योगेश भट्टराई न॑ कहलकै कि ई संशोधन वर्तमान संविधान केरऽ प्रगतिशील दृष्टि के दायरा के भीतर होतै ।नव गठबंधन मे गृहमंत्री बनबाक उम्मीद अछि, नेपाली कांग्रेस नेता रमेश लेखक कहला जे संविधान एहन नहि अछि जेकरा अछूत छोड़ल जाए।प्रचंडा न॑ होनहार शासकीय दलऽ क॑ चेतावनी देलकै कि क्रांति के बाद बनलऽ दलित, महिला आरू जातीय समूहऽ के सशक्तिकरण जैसनऽ कोनो प्रगतिशील उपलब्धि क॑ भंग नै करलऽ जाय आरू दलऽ स॑ आग्रह करलऽ गेलै कि वू सार्वजनिक कार्यालयऽ म॑ महिला सिनी लेली ५० प्रतिशत आरक्षण दै प॑ विचार करै ।

title: NEPAL – CHINA Monsoons: two buses swept away in the Himalayas, water surges at the Three Gorges dam - AsiaNews
description: NEPAL – CHINA Monsoons: two buses swept away in the Himalayas, water surges at the Three Gorges dam  AsiaNews
publisher.title: AsiaNews
full_article:
Kathmandu (AsiaNews/Agencies) – Torrential rains continue to devastate large parts of Asia with unprecedented violence this monsoon season.

In Nepal dozens of people are missing after landslides swept away two buses loaded with passengers into the Trishuli River.

In China at least six people died in floods in Chongqing while rising water level at the Three Gorges reservoir, one of the largest in the world, is raising concern.

The most serious reports come from Nepal, high in the Himalaya, where two buses loaded with passengers disappeared in the Trishuli River at 3.30 am following a landslide in the Simaltal area, along the Narayanghat-Mugling road section in Chitwan district.

According to authorities, one of the two buses, operated by the Ganapati Deluxe company, was headed to Gaur Rautahat from Kathmandu with about 41 passengers. The other, operated by Angel Deluxe, travelling to Kathmandu from Birgunj, had about 24 passengers.

Three passengers reportedly survived by jumping from one of the buses before it was dragged away by the current; meanwhile, rescue teams continue the search for the others.

Nepal has been grappling with monsoon-related disasters for days. In the Kaski district alone, 11 people died in multiple landslides last night.

Even before this morning's disaster, police statistics reported 103 fatalities nationwide from landslides and floods.

In China, the Yangtze (or Long) River, in the southwestern part of the country, is causing the most serious concerns.

Six people died yesterday due to heavy rains in Chongqing, a sprawling metropolis in Dianjiang county. A record level 269.2 mm fell in a single day, affecting more than 40,000 people.

Once again, the gigantic Three Gorges Dam in Hunan province is also a source of great concern, as water level reached 161.1 metres, the highest ever recorded in July since the facility became fully operational in 2012.

The huge structure is more than 180 metres high and more than two km wide, with 39.3 billion cubic metres of water generating electricity equivalent to 20 nuclear power plants.

It took 18 years to build, but Chinese authorities were eager to build the dam despite the controversy over its environmental impact and the forced displacement of 1.3 million people.

The Changjiang Water Resource Commission, a department that specialises in Yangtze River flood prevention and water pollution, is forecasting heavy rainfall along the upper reaches of the river in the next 10 days, and a new round of floods flowing into the Three Gorges Dam reservoir around 16 July.

According to reports from the state broadcaster CCTV , the commission has decided to increase the reservoir’s outflow, which could make the situation in the lower part of the Yangtze even more serious.
translated: काठमांडू (एशियान्यूज/एजेंसी) – ई मानसून केरऽ मौसम म॑ अभूतपूर्व हिंसा के साथ एशिया केरऽ बड़ऽ हिस्सा क॑ मूसलाधार बारिश जारी रहै छै ।नेपाल में दर्जनों लोक लापता अछि, जखन कि भूस्खलन ट्रिशुली नदी में यात्री सं भरल दू टा बस के झाड़ि देल गेल अछि.चीन म॑ चोंगकिंग म॑ बाढ़ म॑ कम स॑ कम छह लोगऽ के मौत होय गेलै जबकि दुनिया केरऽ सबस॑ बड़ऽ गॉर्ज जलाशय प॑ जलस्तर बढ़त॑ जाय रहलऽ छै ।सबसें गंभीर रिपोर्ट हिमालय म॑ ऊँचऽ नेपाल स॑ आबै छै, जहां चिटवन जिला म॑ नारायंगहट मगलऽ के सड़क खंड के साथ-साथ सिमलता क्षेत्र म॑ भूस्खलन के बाद ट्रिशुली नदी म॑ ट्रिशुली नदी म॑ दू बसऽ के भारित दू बसऽ के गायब होय गेलै ।अधिकारियऽ के अनुसार, गणपती डीलक्स कंपनी द्वारा संचालित दू बसऽ म॑ स॑ एगो बसऽ म॑ काठमांडू स॑ गौर रौताहत के तरफ लगभग ४१ यात्री के साथ गौर रौताहत के तरफ जाय रहलऽ छेलै ।दोसरऽ, जेकरा म॑ बिर्गुंज स॑ काठमांडू के यात्रा करै वाला एंजेल डीलक्स द्वारा संचालित छेलै, के पास लगभग २४ यात्री छेलै ।कथित तौर पर तीन टा यात्री सं एकटा बस सं कूदि क' बचल छल, ताहि सं पहिने ओकरा करंट सं घसीट क' दूर कयल गेल ;एम्हर बचाव टीम दोसर के खोज जारी रखैत अछि.नेपाल दिनों स मानसून स संबंधित आपदा स जूझैत रहल अछि।असगर कास्की जिला मे बीतल राति 11 गोटेक मृत्यु अनेक भूस्खलन मे भेल छल ।आइ भोरे के आपदा सं पहिने पुलिस के आंकड़ा के खबर अछि जे देश भर मे 103 लोक के भूस्खलन आओर बाढ़ि सं जानल जाइत अछि.चीन में देश के दक्षिण-पश्चिमी भाग में यांगत्जे (या लंबा) नदी सब सं बेसी गंभीर चिंता के कारण भ रहल अछि.डायंजियांग काउंटी केरऽ एगो विस्तृत महानगर चोंगकिंग म॑ भारी बारिश के वजह स॑ काल्हि छह लोगऽ के मौत होय गेलै ।एक दिन मे रिकॉर्ड स्तर 269.2 मिमी गिर गेल, जाहि सं 40,000 सं बेसि लोक प्रभावित भेल.एक बेर फेर हुनान प्रांत मे विशालकाय तीन गोर्जक बांध सेहो बहुत चिंता क स्रोत अछि, किया कि जल स्तर 161.1 मीटर तक पहुंच गेल, जे जुलाई मे एखन धरि दर्ज कैल गेल अछि, जखन कि 2012 मे सुविधा पूर्ण रूप स परिचालन मे आबि गेल छल।अन्य संरचना 180 मीटर स बेसी उच्च अछि। आरू दू किमी स॑ भी अधिक चौड़ा, जेकरा म॑ ३९.३ अरब घन मीटर पानी पैदा होय वाला बिजली २० परमाणु ऊर्जा संयंत्र के बराबर छै ।एकरऽ निर्माण म॑ १८ साल लगलै, लेकिन चीनी अधिकारियऽ न॑ एकरऽ पर्यावरणीय प्रभाव आरू १० लाख लोगऽ के जबरन विस्थापन प॑ विवाद के बावजूद बांध के निर्माण लेली उत्सुक छेलै ।चांगजियांग जल संसाधन आयोग, एक विभाग जे यांगट्ज़े नदी बाढ़ निवारण आ जल प्रदूषण में विशेषज्ञता रखैत अछि, अगिला 10 दिन में नदी के ऊपरी भाग के संग भारी वर्षा के पूर्वानुमान लगा रहल अछि, आ चारू कात के तीन गोट गॉर्ज्स बांध के जलाशय में बहय वाला बाढ़ि के एकटा नव दौर के बाढ़ि के पूर्वानुमान लगा रहल अछि १६ जुलाई।स्टेट ब्रॉडकास्टर सीसीटीवी केरऽ रिपोर्ट के अनुसार आयोग न॑ जलाशय केरऽ बहिर्वाह बढ़ाबै के फैसला करलकै, जेकरा स॑ यांगत्जे केरऽ निचला हिस्सा म॑ स्थिति क॑ आरू गंभीरता स॑ बनैलऽ जाब॑ सकै छै ।

title: Oli set to return to power in Nepal as Maoist leader Prachanda weighs his options - The Hindu
description: Oli set to return to power in Nepal as Maoist leader Prachanda weighs his options  The Hindu
publisher.title: The Hindu
full_article:
A political drama triggered 10 days ago by the Nepali Congress (NC) and the Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Marxist-Leninist) capped off with the ouster of Prime Minister Pushpa Kamal Dahal ‘Prachanda’ on Friday.

Prachanda, the chairman of the CPN (Maoist Centre), failed his vote of confidence, fifth in one and a half years since he was elected Prime Minister in December 2022, leading to the fall of his government. Of the 258 parliamentarians present in the 275-member Parliament, 63 voted in favour of Prachanda, while 194 voted against. One lawmaker abstained.

President Ram Chandra Poudel on Friday evening called on parties to present a claim, latest by 5 p.m. on Sunday, to form a new government.

As per a deal reached between the Nepali Congress and the CPN-UML, the two largest parties in Parliament with 88 and 78 seats, respectively, the UML’s K.P. Sharma Oli staked claim to lead the government.

Speaking in Parliament, Prachanda said he was betrayed [by Oli] and that he was well aware of who “brought” the NC and the UML together but stopped short of naming anyone. He also said the NC and the UML were making attempts to reverse the Constitution to 1990 and rob people of achievements like inclusion and social justice. The Constitution promulgated in 1990 after the restoration of democracy maintained the constitutional monarchy.

“The Maoists have made the highest contribution to the current Constitution. So the Maoists will not let this Constitution weaken,” said Prachanda. “We had saved this Constitution, achieved with a long struggle of the oppressed and marginalised when attempts were made to destroy it [in the past].”

Prachanda’s fall

As the NC and the UML signed a deal to form a new government, it was a foregone conclusion that Prachanda would lose the confidence vote. The two parties said they had to come together to form a new government so as to establish political stability, amend the Constitution, address the plight of the people and boost the economy.

According to the deal, Mr. Oli would govern for a year and a half, and set the ground for constitutional amendments and then hand over power to the NC’s Sher Bahadur Deuba to oversee the 2027 elections.

Political stability, however, has been a chimera in Nepal. There have been over a dozen governments since the country abolished the centuries-old monarchy and turned into a republic in 2008.

“Government change has been the only constant in Nepal, what’s missing is governance,” said Chandrakishore, a political commentator. “The new government inspires little hope when it comes to basic governance issues.”

Ever since the Maoists laid down arms in 2006 after a decade-long war against the state, Prachanda, 69, has been at the centre of Nepal’s politics. With the fall of his government, Prachanda, who was in his third stint as Prime Minister, has now been thrown into the Opposition after nine years.

Despite fighting the November 2022 general elections under an alliance with the NC, he joined hands with the UML to become Prime Minister in December of that year. But in February 2023, the UML withdrew support in protest of Prachanda’s decision to support the NC’s Ram Chandra Poudel for the post of President. A year later, Prachanda ditched the NC to join hands with the UML again.

“His ouster was just a matter of time,” said Jhalak Subedi, a left-leaning commentator. “Prachanda may be down but not out, as there are questions galore over the longevity of the NC-UML alliance.”

Oli’s return to power

Two House dissolution moves had cost Mr. Oli his job in July 2022 after the Supreme Court ordered the appointment of Mr. Deuba as Prime Minister. It was Mr. Oli’s second stint as Prime Minister after 2015-16 following the promulgation of the Constitution.

Mr. Oli had capitalised on India’s reservations about the Constitution in 2015 and made nationalism his plank for the 2017 general elections. A merger decision between the UML and the Maoist Centre catapulted Mr. Oli into power as the leader of the largest party, controlling almost two-thirds majority in Parliament.

During his speech in Parliament earlier in the day, Prachanda made scathing remarks against Mr. Oli and warned the NC of a possible dissolution attempt, reminding Mr. Oli’s two dissolutions in 2020 and 2021.

“I am worried about regression and authoritarianism,” he said. “An alliance of two largest parties fuels anarchy and weakens democracy.”

Mr. Chandrakishore says Mr. Oli is a leader who can pull off more Machiavellian tricks than any other politician in Nepal. “Under Oli, or the UML-NC government for that matter, stability and issues of social justice, service delivery, development or people’s concerns are unlikely to be the priority,” he said. “Rather, the danger is that the NC and the UML might take some regressive steps in the name of constitutional amendments.”

Mr. Subedi also said political stability is a ruse woven by the two parties to gain power. “Did not Oli have a majority a few years ago? Why wasn’t there stability then?,” he asked.

The deal, however, has been kept under wraps.

“The NC and the UML decided to come together after they realised that a gallimaufry of skeletons would start tumbling out of their closets,” said Mr. Chandrakishore. “How can one see the light of hope from a deal that two parties have signed in a dark room?”

translated: नेपाली कांग्रेस (एनसी) आ नेपाल (यूनिफाइड मार्क्सवादी-लेनिनवादी) द्वारा 10 दिन पहिने 10 दिन पहिने प्रधानमंत्री पुष्पा कमाल दहल 'प्रचंडा' के सत्ता सं सटले समाहित भ गेल छल.सीपीएन (माओवादी केंद्र) के अध्यक्ष प्रचंडा न॑ अपनऽ विश्वास मतदान करलकै, जे दिसंबर २०२२ म॑ प्रधानमंत्री चुनलो गेलै, जेकरा स॑ हुनकऽ सरकार केरऽ पतन होय ​​गेलै, एक डेढ़ साल म॑ पाँचमऽ स्थान प॑ विफल रहलै ।275 सदस्यीय संसद मे उपस्थित 258 संसद सदस्य मे स 63 गोटे प्रचंडा क पक्ष मे मतदान केलथि, जखन कि 194 क खिलाफ वोट देलथि।एकटा विधायक परहेज केलनि।राष्ट्रपति राम चंद्र पौडेल शुक्रदिन साँझ मे पार्टी सभ सं आह्वान केलनि जे रविदिन 5 बजे सं 5 बजे सं एकटा दावा प्रस्तुत करय लेल एकटा दावा प्रस्तुत करय लेल कहल गेल अछि.नेपाली कांग्रेस आरू सीपीएन-यूएमएल के बीच पहुँचलौ सौदा के अनुसार, संसद मँ दू सबसें बड़ऽ दल नँ क्रमशः ८८ आरू ७८ सीट वाला यूएमएल केरौ केपी शर्मा ओली नँ सरकार के नेतृत्व करै के दावा दांव लगाय देलकै ।संसद में बोलतें हुअ॑ प्रचंडा न॑ कहलकै कि ओकरा [ओली स॑] धोखा देलऽ गेलऽ छै आरू ओकरा ई बात के अच्छा तरह स॑ पता छै कि एनसी आरू यूएमएल क॑ एक साथ के “कला” करलकै लेकिन ककरो नाम लेबै स॑ कम रुकी गेलै ।हुनी ई भी कहलकै कि एनसी आरू यूएमएल 1990 तलक संविधान क उलटै के कोशिश करी रहलौ छै आरू समावेश आरू सामाजिक न्याय जैसनौ उपलब्धियौ के लोगौ क लूटै छै ।लोकतंत्र के बहाली के संवैधानिक राजतंत्र के बरकरार रखला के बाद 1990 में घोषित संविधान |“माओवादी वर्तमान संविधान मे सर्वोच्च योगदान देलक अछि।तेँ माओवादी लोकनि एहि संविधान केँ कमजोर नहि होमय देताह।’ प्रैचन्द कहलनि।“हमरा लोकनि एहि संविधान केँ बचा लेने रही, जे [अतीत मे] एकरा नष्ट करबाक प्रयास कयल गेल छल तखन उत्पीड़ित आ हाशिया पर एकटा लंबा संघर्ष सँ प्राप्त कयल गेल छल।”एनसी आरू यूएमएल के रूप म॑ प्रचंडा केरऽ पतन नयऽ सरकार केरऽ गठन लेली एगो सौदा प॑ हस्ताक्षर करलकै, ई एगो पूर्व निष्कर्ष छेलै कि प्रचंडा क॑ विश्वास मतदान होय ​​जैतै ।दूनू दल न॑ कहलकै कि ओकरा एक साथ आबी क॑ एगो नया सरकार के गठन करना छै ताकि राजनीतिक स्थिरता स्थापित करलऽ जाय, संविधान म॑ संशोधन करी क॑ जनता के दुर्दशा के समाधान करी क॑ अर्थव्यवस्था क॑ बढ़ावा देलऽ जाय सक॑ ।सौदा के अनुसार श्री ओली डेढ़ साल तक शासन करतै, आरू संवैधानिक संशोधन के आधार तैयार करतै आरू ओकरा बाद 2027 के चुनाव के देखरेख करै लेली एनसी के शेर बहादुर देउबा क सत्ता सौंपतै ।राजनीतिक स्थिरता, तथापि, नेपाल मे एकटा काइमेरा रहल अछि।देश न॑ सदियो पुरानऽ राजतंत्र क॑ समाप्त करी क॑ २००८ म॑ गणतंत्र म॑ बदली क॑ एक दर्जन स॑ अधिक सरकारऽ के रूप म॑ एक दर्जन स॑ भी अधिक सरकारऽ के रूप म॑ काम करलकै ।यपल म॑ सरकार परिवर्तन एकमात्र स्थिरांक रहलऽ छै, जे कि गायब छै, वू छै शासन केरऽ गायनता ।“नव सरकार शासन केरऽ बुनियादी मुद्दा के बात आबै छै त॑ बहुत कम आशा के प्रेरणा दै छै।”जहिया स॑ 2006 म॑ राज्य के खिलाफ एक दशक भर के युद्ध के बाद माओवादी न॑ हथियार रखलकै, 69 वर्षीय प्रचंडा न॑ नेपाल केरऽ राजनीति के केंद्र म॑ छै ।अपनऽ सरकार केरऽ पतन के साथ प्रधानमंत्री के रूप म॑ अपनऽ तेसरऽ कार्यकाल म॑ रहला के बाद अब॑ नौ साल बाद विपक्ष म॑ फेंकलऽ गेलऽ छै ।नवंबर 2022 केरऽ आम चुनाव स॑ लड़ै के बावजूद एनसी के साथ गठबंधन के तहत, वू यूएमएल के साथ मिल क॑ वू साल दिसंबर म॑ प्रधानमंत्री बनलै ।लेकिन फरवरी २०२३ म॑ यूएमएल न॑ राष्ट्रपति पद लेली एनसी केरऽ राम चंद्र पौडेल क॑ समर्थन दै के प्रचंडा केरऽ फैसला के विरोध म॑ समर्थन वापस ल॑ लेलकै ।एक साल बाद प्रचंडा न॑ एनसी क॑ खाई म॑ डाललकै कि फेरू स॑ यूएमएल के साथ हाथ मिलाबै ।वामपंथी झुकाव वाला टिप्पणीकार झालाक सुबेडी कहलनि जे, हुनकर साहस मात्र समयक बात छल।“प्रचंडा डाउन भ सकैत अछि मुदा बाहर नहि, कारण एनसी-यूएमएल एलायंस के दीर्घायु पर सवालक भरमार अछि।”ओली केरऽ सत्ता म॑ वापसी दू सदन केरऽ विघटन केरऽ कदम स॑ श्री ओली क॑ जुलाई २०२२ म॑ हुनकऽ नौकरी के वजह स॑ हुनकऽ नौकरी के नुकसान होय ​​गेलऽ छेलै, जेकरा बाद सुप्रीम कोर्ट न॑ श्री डेउबा क॑ प्रधानमंत्री के रूप म॑ नियुक्त करै के आदेश देल॑ छेलै ।संविधान केरऽ घोषणा के बाद २०१५-१६ के बाद प्रधानमंत्री के रूप म॑ श्री ओली केरऽ दोसरऽ कार्यकाल छेलै ।श्री ओली न॑ २०१५ म॑ संविधान के बारे म॑ भारत केरऽ आरक्षण के पूंजी बनैल॑ छेलै आरू २०१७ केरऽ आम चुनाव लेली राष्ट्रवाद क॑ अपनऽ तख्ता बनैल॑ छेलै ।यूएमएल आरू माओवादी केंद्र के बीच एगो विलय के फैसला स॑ श्री ओली क॑ सबसें बड़ऽ पार्टी केरऽ नेता के रूप म॑ सत्ता म॑ शामिल करी क॑ संसद म॑ लगभग दू तिहाई बहुमत प॑ नियंत्रण रखलकै ।दिन केरऽ पहले संसद म॑ अपनऽ भाषण के दौरान प्रचंडा न॑ श्री ओली के खिलाफ कड़ा टिप्पणी करलकै आरू एनसी क॑ एक संभावित विघटन के प्रयास के बारे म॑ चेतावनी देल॑ छेलै, जेकरा म॑ श्री ओली केरऽ दू विघटन क॑ 2020 आरू 2021 म॑ याद दिलाबै के काम करलकै ।“हमरा प्रतिगमन आरू निरंकुशता के बारे म॑ चिंतित छै । कहलक।“दू टा पैघ दल के गठबंधन अराजकता के ईंधन दैत अछि आ लोकतंत्र के कमजोर करैत अछि।”श्री चंद्राकिशोर के कहनाय छनि जे श्री ओली एकटा एहन नेता छथिन्ह जे नेपाल के कोनो आन राजनीतिज्ञ सं बेसि मैकियावेली के चाल खींच सकय छथिन्ह.हुनी कहलकै, “ओएलआई के तहत, या यूएमएल-एनसी सरकार लेली वू मामला, स्थिरता आरू सामाजिक न्याय, सेवा प्रदायगी, विकास या लोगऽ के चिंता के मुद्दा क प्राथमिकता के संभावना कम छै ।“बल्कि खतरा ई छै कि एनसी आरू यूएमएल संविधान संशोधन के नाम पर कुछ प्रतिगमनात्मक कदम उठाय सकै छै।”श्री सुन्नी न॑ ई भी कहलकै कि राजनीतिक स्थिरता सत्ता हासिल करै लेली दूनू दलऽ द्वारा बुनलऽ जाय वाला चालू छै ।“की ओएलआई किछु साल पहिने बहुमत नहि अछि?तखन स्थिरता कियैक नहि छल?”-ओ पुछलनि।मुदा एहि सौदा मे लपेट कए राखल गेल अछि।श्री चन्द्राकिशोर कहलकै, “एनसी आरू यूएमएल न॑ एक साथ आबै के फैसला करलकै जब॑ ओकरा सिनी क॑ ई अहसास होलै कि कंकाल केरऽ एगो गैलिमाउफ्री अपनऽ कोठरी स॑ बाहर टम्बल होय जाय लागतै ।“एकटा एहन सौदासँ आशाक प्रकाश कोना देखल जा सकैत अछि जकरा दू टा पक्ष अन्हार कोठलीमे साइन केने अछि ?”टिप्पणी पढ़ें कॉपी लिंक ईमेल फेसबुक ट्विटर टेलीग्राम LinkedIn whatsapp reddit read बाद में हटाएँ सभी देखें प्रिंट var totalpcount = title: Nepal: More than 50 missing after landslide triggered by heavy monsoon rain sweeps two buses into river - Sky News
description: Nepal: More than 50 missing after landslide triggered by heavy monsoon rain sweeps two buses into river  Sky News
publisher.title: Sky News
full_article:
Dozens of people are missing after two buses were swept into a swollen river in Nepal by a landslide amid torrential monsoon rain.

The buses were swept off a road and into the Trishuli River near Simaltal, about 74 miles west of the capital Kathmandu, at around 3am.

The vehicles were travelling on the key highway connecting the capital to southern parts of Nepal.

Image: Pic: Reuters

Image: Three people managed to escape the buses before they were swept away. Pic: Reuters

Rabi Lamichhane, the country's home minister, told its parliament 51 passengers were unaccounted for and more than 500 rescue personnel have been assigned to the search operation.

Earlier, 62 people were reported missing but this number was revised down after passenger details were collected from bus operators.

Three passengers were rescued and are receiving hospital treatment, government administrator Khima Nanada Bhusal said.

The survivors jumped out of a bus and swam to the riverbank where they were rescued by local residents who took them to a nearby hospital.

Seven Indian nationals were among the missing passengers, a district official said.

Image: Pic: Reuters

The local authorities said they would resume the search in the morning, which had already been hampered by continuous rain and more landslides.

A third bus was hit by another landslide on Friday morning a short distance away on the same highway. The driver of the vehicle was killed.

Read more from Sky News:

Four die in Channel during crossing attempt

Soldier and husband accused of spying for Russia

Blair, Johnson and Beckham invited to Indian wedding

Elsewhere in the country, 17 people have died and three more were injured due to landslides in different districts in the 24 hours before the buses were swept away, home minister Mr Lamichhane added.

The deaths included 11 people killed when landslides washed away three houses in Kaski district, 93 miles west of the capital, police spokesperson Dan Bahadur Karki said.

Follow Sky News on WhatsApp Keep up with all the latest news from the UK and around the world by following Sky News Tap here

At least 91 people have been killed since mid-June as torrential monsoon rainfall continues to trigger landslides and flooding across the mountainous Himalayan country.

Be the first to get Breaking News Install the Sky News app for free

In a social media post on Friday, Prime Minister Pushpa Kamal Dahal said he was deeply saddened by the incidents, while the government also announced plans to ban night bus operations in places with poor weather forecasting facilities.

पास ट्रिशुली नदी में बहैत छल, करीब 3 बजे.गाड़ी सब राजधानी के नेपाल के दक्षिणी भाग सं जोड़य वाला प्रमुख राजमार्ग पर जा रहल छल.छवि: पिक: रायटर छवि : तीन गोटे बस स बचबा स पहिने ओकरा सब कए बहबा स पहिने स बचबा मे सफल रहल।पिक : देश केरऽ गृह मंत्री रबी लामिचने न॑ अपनऽ संसद स॑ कहलकै कि 51 यात्री सिनी क॑ अनियंत्रित करलऽ गेलऽ छै आरू खोज अभियान म॑ ५०० स॑ अधिक बचावकर्मी क॑ नियुक्त करलऽ गेलऽ छै ।एहि सं पहिने 62 गोटे के लापता भेल छल मुदा बस संचालक सं यात्री के विवरण एकत्रित करला के बाद एहि संख्या मे संशोधन कएल गेल छल.सरकारी प्रशासक खिमा नानादा भूसाल कहलनि जे, तीन यात्री के बचा लेल गेल आ अस्पताल के इलाज भ रहल अछि।बचि गेल लोक एकटा बस सं कूदि क' हेलि क' नदीक कात मे आबि गेल जतय ओकरा सभ कें स्थानीय निवासी लोकनि बचा लेलक जे ओकरा सभ कें नजदीकक अस्पताल ल' गेल.एक जिला अधिकारी कहलनि जे, सात भारतीय नागरिक गायब यात्री मे शामिल छल।छवि: पिक: रायटर स्थानीय अधिकारी सब कहलनि जे ओ सब भोरे खोज शुरू करताह, जे पहिने सं लगातार बरखा आ बेसी भूस्खलन के कारण बाधित भ गेल छल.शुक्रदिन भोरे एकटा आओर भूस्खलन के तेसर बस के ओही हाईवे पर किछुए दूरी पर मारल गेल.गाड़ीक ड्राइवरक हत्या भेल।SKY NEWS: Crossing AttreaS के दौरान चार मरने के साथ चार मरना सैनिक और पति के जासूसी के आरोप में रूस ब्लेयर, जॉनसन और बेकहम के देश में अन्य जगह भारतीय शादी में आमंत्रित, 17 लोगों की मृत्यु है और विभिन्न जिलाओं में भूस्खलित के कारण तीन और घायल हो गया | बस के बहय सं पहिने 24 घंटा मे गृह मंत्री श्री लमिशिने कहलनि।पुलिस प्रवक्ता दान बहादुर कार्की कहलनि जे, एहि मौत मे 11 गोटे के मौत भ गेल छल जखन राजधानी सं 93 मील पश्चिम कास्की जिला मे भूस्खलन तीन घर धोबय वाला छल.SKY NEWS ON WHATSAPP क॑ यूके आरू दुनिया भर केरऽ सब नवीनतम खबरऽ के साथ चलतें हुअ॑ स्काई न्यूज टैप क॑ फॉलो करी क॑ जून के मध्य स॑ ही कम स॑ कम ९१ लोगऽ के मौत होय गेलऽ छै, कैन्हेंकि मूसलाधार मानसून वर्षा के कारण पहाड़ी हिमालय के पार भूस्खलन आरू बाढ़ के शुरुआत होय रहलऽ छै । देश।शुक्रदिन सोशल मीडिया पोस्ट में ब्रेकिंग न्यूज इंस्टॉल करय वाला पहिल बेर प्रधानमंत्री पुष्पा कमल दाहल कहलनि जे एहि घटना सब सं हुनका गहरा दुख भेलनि, जखन कि सरकार के संग रात्रि बस संचालन पर रोक लगेबाक योजना सेहो घोषणा केलक अछि. मौसम के खराब पूर्वानुमान सुविधा।

title: Trading mushrooms for motorbikes spells change for Nepal’s remote Dolpo - Post Magazine
description: Trading mushrooms for motorbikes spells change for Nepal’s remote Dolpo  Post Magazine
publisher.title: Post Magazine
full_article:
“In the Himalayan region, it is becoming quite common to ride such dirt bikes,” says Tashi Chosang, a teacher from nearby Charka. “There are about 45 in my village. All of them were bought from China in the last few years.”

American novelist and naturalist Peter Matthiessen’s account of his travels with zoologist George Schaller in The Snow Leopard (1978) portrayed Dolpo as a land where time stands still, big cats lurk, sacred monasteries guard lonely mountain slopes and prayer flags flutter on desolate passes. The arduous journey the pair endured, from the lowlands to the gateway of the “timeless land”, has since been circumvented by a short flight, but beyond that not much has changed.

Even when Nepal began aggressively building roads 50 years ago, access to Dolpo remained almost impossible. A track finally climbed the 2,000 metres to Dolpa district headquarters, Dunai, on the southern edge of the region, in 2018, making it the penultimate administrative district to be connected to the national road network.

{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"ImageObject","caption":"On top of the world between Nepal and Tibet. Photo: Neelima Vallangi","url":"https://cdn.i-scmp.com/sites/default/files/d8/images/canvas/2024/07/10/1d606974-1b90-405f-aded-7740ec1c8311_df8ce7c6.jpg"} On top of the world between Nepal and Tibet. Photo: Neelima Vallangi

In Dolpo, a “road” can mean anything from an earthen track to a slippery foot trail hugging a slope above a ferocious river. It can also mean a Swiss-engineered steel suspension bridge.

Dolpo may have remained off-limits and unknown to the rest of the world for centuries, but it was always inextricably tied to Tibet, geographically and economically, as well as culturally.

For centuries, Dolpopa, as the people of Dolpo call themselves, were middlemen, trading goods between the Tibetan plateau and Nepali midlands. Two 5,500-metre-high border crossings, Kyato and Marim La (“la” meaning “pass”), connected Dolpo and Tibet. Barley and sometimes buckwheat were exchanged for salt, butter, wool and livestock in Tibet, which were then taken back to Nepal, where the salt was traded for larger quantities of grain, spices and other staple items. The traders and their yak caravans undertook treacherous, month-long trips across the vertiginous passes, even in inclement weather, but provided an essential means of sustenance for the people of Dolpo, who could cultivate only potatoes and barley, in limited quantities.

The Tibetan uprising of 1959, almost a decade after annexation by Beijing, led to border closures and the loss of ancient trade routes, social ties and cross-border grazing. The influx to Nepal of cheap, iodised salt from India in the 1960s marked the end of Nepal’s dependency on Tibetan rock salt. But in the 90s, as the Dolpopa struggled to find their footing amid tightening border controls and declining trade prospects, an unexpected trend was gathering pace in China.

{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"ImageObject","caption":"The Dho Tarap Valley in far northwest Nepal. Photo: Neelima Vallangi","url":"https://cdn.i-scmp.com/sites/default/files/d8/images/canvas/2024/07/10/b525bf50-0005-4e9a-a3bd-dce36e22f6fa_df8ce7c6.jpg"} The Dho Tarap Valley in far northwest Nepal. Photo: Neelima Vallangi

During the 1993 National Games in Beijing, Chinese athletes astounded the world with record-breaking performances in various events, prompting doping allegations. Chinese coach Ma Zunren dismissed all accusations, claiming intense, high-altitude training and a stress-relieving tonic prepared from caterpillar fungus were responsible for the athletes’ results.

Found only in Himalayan pastures above 3,500 metres in India, Bhutan and Nepal – and to some extent in China – caterpillar fungus ( Ophiocordyceps sinensis ) is a parasitic fungus that takes over and mummifies the body of moth larvae to form the medicinal mushroom.

Suddenly, this obscure, traditional Tibetan and Chinese medicine ingredient was in the global spotlight. Demand was such that what previously sold for US$1,400 a kilogram was going for as much as US$150,000 a kilogram for the best product, with a median range of US$40,000 to US$50,000.

“[With] the rise of the caterpillar fungus phenomenon, a great deal of wealth has flowed into this mountain vastness,” wrote anthropologist Kenneth Bauer in his 2014 essay “High Frontiers: Dolpo Revisited”, “infusing a marginal and considerably constrained political economy with a dynamism and resilience whose forms could hardly have been imagined two decades ago.”

{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"ImageObject","caption":"A Chinese bike adorned with Tibetan script in Dolpo. Photo: Neelima Vallangi","url":"https://cdn.i-scmp.com/sites/default/files/d8/images/canvas/2024/07/10/0a218399-c694-40e5-94c4-adcde9dbe8f6_df8ce7c6.jpg"} A Chinese bike adorned with Tibetan script in Dolpo. Photo: Neelima Vallangi

Hence the bikes.

Starting in 2001, when cross-border commerce was again legalised by the Nepalese government, the Dolpopa could sell yarsagumba (as the medicine is known in Nepal) directly to Chinese traders. A good harvest allows the Dolpopa to make large purchases, such as motorcycles, for 135,000 Nepalese rupees (HK$7,800) for basic models, and far more for off-road dirt bikes, all coming from the People’s Republic.

When Namka Gurung, from Dho, the first person in Dolpo to buy a bike, saw the motorcycles in China, he immediately wanted to try one at home, having always enjoyed riding in Kathmandu. Sporting a couple of gold teeth and dressed in a pink tunic with gold brocade, Gurung recalls how he has helped more than 40 people learn to ride. He’s pleased to have started the trend.

“Some people already knew how to ride, but most others were quite quick to learn after some instruction,” he says. “And there haven’t been any accidents here so far either. Having all these bikes reduces the [transport] difficulty in our villages.”

The vehicles are bought unregistered from China, exchanged for cash after a yarsagumba sale, or taken on credit, to be paid for in instalments. Petrol is also bought from China, or Mustang, the neighbouring district to the east.

{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"ImageObject","caption":"Dharkey, local resident of Dolpo, on her imported Chinese motorcycle. Photo: Neelima Vallangi","url":"https://cdn.i-scmp.com/sites/default/files/d8/images/canvas/2024/07/10/182b9468-3594-4d8e-8ffe-49da186eef3a_df8ce7c6.jpg"} Dharkey, local resident of Dolpo, on her imported Chinese motorcycle. Photo: Neelima Vallangi

More than 200 Chinese-brand motorcycles, such as Lifan, Jiaqing, Honlei and Guizun, all powered by 250cc to 300cc engines, were pushed over high passes and lowered into valleys using ropes, many having arrived before the road to Dho was finished.

Tsering Lhamo, meanwhile, grew tired of relying on others to move around and took matters into her own hands by learning how to ride a motorcycle in Kathmandu. “Last year, I ordered my bike from someone who went to China and bought it for me,” she says. Lhamo is one of only three women among 200-odd bikers in Dolpo. “It was far easier to ride [in Kathmandu], where the roads are better,” she adds. “But even though it is difficult here, knowing how to ride makes me feel free and independent.”

Setting out on four dirt-bikes – me riding pillion – alongside the Tarap River, we meet a bulldozer making headway into the valley from the other bank. We cross a stream and start the climb to the 5,100 metre Choi La.

As we make our way up the winding path into the next inhabited valley, herders are bringing their yaks down on narrow trails. Like the yaks, the dirt bikes are suited to the rough terrain, yet look so incongruous in the wild landscape: signs of a new chapter being written in the annals of Dolpo, just as roads are being written into the terrain.

Once roadless Dolpo is being connected to the national network in the south and to Mustang. The Marim and Kyato border crossings can now be reached by motorable roads on the Tibetan side. On the Nepalese side, nearly 60km of earthen tracks have been cut, all the way to Dho, even if they are suitable for expensive motorcycles only.

{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"ImageObject","caption":"In this isolated region of Nepal, yak herding is still an essential part of life. Photo: Neelima Vallangi","url":"https://cdn.i-scmp.com/sites/default/files/d8/images/canvas/2024/07/10/1efda4af-e11a-45d4-8ed3-7ab1d5e627f8_df8ce7c6.jpg"} In this isolated region of Nepal, yak herding is still an essential part of life. Photo: Neelima Vallangi

When the last few, uncut kilometres from Dho to Dunai are opened, a drivable lifeline will stretch across the heart of Dolpo for the first time.

Tinje Valley, at 4,200 metres, is much wider than the Tarap Valley and agriculture is far more expansive, with far-ranging fields under cultivation in the fertile region alongside the river. Remnants of ancient ramparts stand among swaying barley, with snow-tipped peaks soaring all around. The old trail from Tingyu, which extends all the way to Tibet via the Marim La and secured the village’s place on the ancient trade route, is now a compressed-earth track.

Today, Chinese buyers do not demand much except yarsagumba , with climate change and over-exploitation by increasing numbers of permit holders gathering the mushroom now affecting supply. Meanwhile, the Dolpopa have come to depend heavily on the Chinese market: buying goods on the mainland side makes more sense than trudging for several days to Dunai, where supplies delivered by air or mule cost several times more.

“We always had very good trade relations between Dolpo and China, from ancient times, when our forefathers were around,” says villager Pena Darke. “We were bartering just salt and barley then, but now we have moved to cash transactions and indulge in the yarsagumba trade. If we have to go all the way to Dunai it will take us much longer and be more expensive. It’s much easier and far more accessible for us to pay a bit more in the Chinese market.” Purchases include essentials such as groceries, noodles and other dried goods, as well as canned beer, juices and electronics.

Last night it snowed; and it is the sort of freezing, rainy morning at the top of the world that would ordinarily compel you to crawl back into bed and cancel the rest of the day. But that’s not an option in Tingyu, where life revolves around land and livestock. Women are already out in the fields. Most men have left to tend to their herds. Yaks graze nearby on the snow-covered slopes above the village.

{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"ImageObject","caption":"An ancient monastery watches over this most isolated Nepali valley. Photo: Neelima Vallangi","url":"https://cdn.i-scmp.com/sites/default/files/d8/images/canvas/2024/07/10/931926a7-491d-4ec4-a9a6-91190a0fe1a7_df8ce7c6.jpg"} An ancient monastery watches over this most isolated Nepali valley. Photo: Neelima Vallangi

In a dark, cold basement of a house, where the only light comes from a solar lamp and a log fire, an old man enthusiastically empties colourful packets of dried fruit into cups containing Chinese tea bags and sugar cubes and fills them with hot water. Once, this staple drink would have been salty yak-butter tea.

The old man, who lives with his youngest daughter, says, “These packaged foods may not be healthy, but they are convenient, since we’re so busy with back-breaking, physical work most of the time.”

Some of his contemporaries have been known to complain about motorcycle noise and related disturbances, but road building has strong political momentum and widespread public support.

Sonam Lama, an urban planner supporting the Dolpo local government, says authorities must minimise the inevitable negative effects of highway construction: not just noise and air pollution, but also increasing numbers of people descending on an ecologically sensitive region such as the Dho Tarap Valley.

“[Roads] will affect the traditional way of life here,” he says. “So our task is to balance having a road with protecting the culture, as well as the environment.”

Meanwhile, as radical changes take hold, herder and new bike owner Phurba Tsepten is covered either way. “We do not have [motorcycle] papers or registration, so we’re hesitant and stick to riding between the border and Dho,” he says. “But otherwise, it has been very comfortable to have the bikes. And where the bikes can’t go, I take the horses.”

“हमरा सब क॑ हमेशा डोल्पो आरू चीन के बीच, प्राचीन काल स॑, जब॑ हमरऽ पूर्वजऽ के आसपास छेलै, बहुत अच्छा व्यापारिक संबंध छेलै ।“हम तखन बस नमक आ जौ के आदान-प्रदान क रहल छलहुं, मुदा आब हम नकद लेनदेन मे आबि कहीं बेसी सुलभ अछि।”खरीददारी मे किराना, नूडल्स आ अन्य सूखल सामानक संग-संग डिब्बाबंद बीयर, जूस आ इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स जेहन आवश्यक वस्तु शामिल अछि ।काल्हि राति मे बर्फ पड़ल;आ ई एहन तरहक जमब, बरसातक भोर मे दुनियाक शीर्ष पर अछि जे साधारणतया अहाँ केँ फेर सँ रेंगय लेल बाध्य करत आ दिनक शेष भाग केँ रद्द क' देत.मुदा से टिंग्यु में कोनो विकल्प नहिं, जतय जीवन जमीन आ माल-जाल के इर्द-गिर्द घूमैत अछि.महिला पहिने स खेत मे बाहर छथि।बेसी पुरुष अपन झुंड दिस झुकबाक लेल चलि गेल छथि ।गामक ऊपरक बर्फसँ आच्छादित ढलान पर लग मे याक्स चरैत अछि ।{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"imageobject"," कैप्शन": "एक प्राचीन मठ के 6-91190a6. ई सबसँ बेसी अलग-थलग नेपाली घाटी।फोटो: नीलिमा वैलांगी एक घर के एक अन्हार, ठंडा तहखाने में, जहाँ एकमात्र प्रकाश एक सौर दीपों और एक लकड़ी के आग स॑ आबै छै, एक बुढ़िया उत्साहपूर्वक सूखलऽ फलऽ के रंगीन पैकेट क॑ कप म॑ खाली करै छै जेकरा म॑ चीनी चाय के बैग आरू चीनी के घन होय ​​छै आरू ओकरा भर॑ छै । गरम पानिक संग।एक बेर, ई स्टेपल पेय नमकीन याक-मक्खन चाह होइत ।अपनऽ छोटऽ बेटी के साथ रह॑ वाला बुढ़ापा कहै छै, “ई पैकेज्ड फूड्स स्वस्थ नै होय सकै छै, लेकिन ई सुविधाजनक छै, कैन्हेंकि हमनी अधिकांश समय बैक-ब्रेकिंग, शारीरिक काम के साथ एतना व्यस्त छियै।”हुनकऽ कुछ समकालीन मोटरसाइकिल केरऽ शोर आरू संबंधित गड़बड़ी के शिकायत करै लेली जानलऽ जाय रहलऽ छै, लेकिन सड़क निर्माण म॑ राजनीतिक गति आरू व्यापक जनसमर्थन छै ।डोल्पो स्थानीय सरकार के समर्थन करै वाला शहरी योजनाकार सोनाम लामा के कहना छै कि अधिकारियऽ क॑ राजमार्ग निर्माण केरऽ अपरिहार्य नकारात्मक प्रभाव क॑ कम स॑ कम करना चाहियऽ : खाली शोर आरू वायु प्रदूषण नै, बल्कि ई पारिस्थितिकी के दृष्टि स॑ संवेदनशील क्षेत्र जेना कि डीएचओ ताराप घाटी प॑ उतरै वाला लोगऽ के संख्या बढ़ी जाय छै ।ओ कहैत छथि, “[रोड्स] एहि ठामक पारंपरिक जीवन पद्धति कए प्रभावित करत।“त हमर सबहक काज अछि जे संस्कृतिक रक्षाक संग सड़क रखबाक संग-संग पर्यावरणक संग संतुलन बनाबी।”एम्हर, जेना-जेना आमूल परिवर्तन पकड़ैत अछि, हरर्डर आ नव बाइक मालिक फिरबा त्सेप्टेन के दुनू तरहे कवर कएल गेल अछि.ओ कहैत छथि, “हमरा सब लग [मोटरसाइकिल] पेपर या रजिस्ट्रेशन नहि अछि, ताहि लेल हम सब संकोच करैत छी आ सीमा आ ढो क बीच सवार भ कए अडिग छी।“मुदा अन्यथा बाइक रखबा मे बहुत सहज रहल अछि।आ जतय बाइक नहि जा सकैत अछि, हम घोड़ा सभकेँ लऽ लैत छी।”
